title: No Plan B
description:
In No Plan B, every choice you make, however small, may decide the fate of your team. Assemble your squad. Work out the perfect plan. Watch it play out in real time. Study the 3D map carefully and use the innovative timeline system to move and synchronize your team. Coordinate your movements, grenades and room entries to take the enemy by surprise. Content Warning
One wrong move, one corner left unchecked , could be fatal to your mission there’s no plan B Once you’re confident your plan is perfect, the time has come to execute your actions and press that play button. Watch your orders unfold, and get right into the middle of the action with the full-control camera.
Hero or villain ? Choose from the 4 available factions and complete different types of missions. Rescue hostages or plan a bank robbery, we’re not judging. Equip the appropriate gear and fine-tune it to match your playstyle and adapt to the situation at hand. Customize your operators to elevate the tacti -coolness of your cinematic replays.
Challenge yourself with multi-path rogue-like campaign : Select carefully on the map which missions you’ll take and which rewards you’ll need. Assemble your tactical squad, develop their individual skills, and unlock new weapons, shields and grenades as you progress through the campaign. In a rush? Take on the skirmish missions or tackle the latest daily, weekly or monthly challenge. Already completed everything ? Generate new missions or create your own using the built-in editor and share it with others

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 510+, Radeon HD5900+, or Intel HD4000+
